name: pami
body:
Python Asset Management Inserter

Interacts with the user to input asset data into the web portal using Python and Selenium. All data/log files are ignored, and the script is otherwise unable to be utilized outside of the intranet. Later implementations:. - may utilize a concurrent thread driving PhantomJS to input assets as user data is collected - may allow arguments on execution that will parse a given csv file containing all necessary documentation - may bypass webportal if direct SQL DB connection can be made
